definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Filters for fuel oil, lube oil, hydraulic power line oil, cutting oil.
sentences.chinese: 用於燃油，潤滑油，液壓油切削油的過濾器。

sentences.english: Determines the resistance of lubricating grease to flow under prescribed conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在規定條件下測量潤滑油脂的抗移動性。

sentences.english: Applied to engine circulatory system. Anti-corrosion. Economic durability.
sentences.chinese: 引擎循環系統專用潤滑油，防鏽蝕，經濟耐用。

sentences.english: Leakage of hydraulic oil pollutes industrial lubrication oil and surface of aluminium strip and foil.
sentences.chinese: 液壓油的泄漏會污染工藝潤滑油及鋁帶箔表面。

sentences.english: At the start stage, with larger spin ratios, there is faster discharge of the entrapped lubricants.
sentences.chinese: 隨時間推移，自旋因數越小，封閉潤滑油排出越快。

sentences.english: The effect of lubricant on double-revolution shaking have also been studied through experiments.
sentences.chinese: 還研究了潤滑油種類對雙週晃動的影響。

sentences.english: Tongyi has three lube oil blending plants in China with a total annual capacity of 600,000 tons.
sentences.chinese: 統一在中國有三家潤滑油調配廠，年產能達60萬噸。

sentences.english: This Non-Lube air cylinder offers elasticity to to tight budgets without sacrificing quality.
sentences.chinese: 這種非氣缸潤滑油提供彈性的預算緊張而犧牲質量。

sentences.english: Overshot parts are usually covered with grease lest they should rust.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦打撈筒配件通常都塗潤滑油，以防生鏽。

sentences.english: Will you please have the car greased?
sentences.chinese: 這輛車請你上點潤滑油好嗎？

sentences.english: Acting Mobil Esso lubricants, hydraulic oil, gear oil products, price concessions.
sentences.chinese: 代理美孚埃索潤滑油，齒輪油液壓油等系列產品。

sentences.english: Discusses fluid-film and rolling-element bearing theory and application.
sentences.chinese: 討論潤滑油膜與滾動軸承的理論和應用。

sentences.english: Guide pillar mountings with self-oiling rings of pillar for smooth guiding.
sentences.chinese: 滑動導柱底座，帶自動潤滑油環。

sentences.english: It's the oil that lubricates $14 trillion of global trade.
sentences.chinese: 它是實現14萬億美元全球貿易的潤滑油。

sentences.english: Deacidification test for lube distillates by a compound solvent was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 一種複合脫酸溶劑被用於潤滑油餾分的脫酸實驗。

sentences.english: Lubricant bases can be mineral or synthetic.
sentences.chinese: 潤滑油基礎油可以是礦物油或合成油。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
